title: LF people to do rank to get back to Gold
body: Currently silver 3... Looking to get back to gold, as ranks gotten more anoying with everyone rising as premades. Its getting harder to solo queue now. Just comment IGN and roles. I generally play top/mid but can also supp.

replies.body: Qilli, Silver V, just another noob. Jg/Top

Support Leona, Plat 5 100LP last season but now Gold IV and climbing quickly.

Can play ADC/Support proficiently, but support is more preferred.
Caddysmack - adc main,  top or mid, can supp

Cabalia

Mid/Sup/Jg

Premade seems the way to go fam

sobohred

role top, ad, jg

was g3 last season went 7-3 and silver 1, toxic swamp

IGN: JIC IM CRAZY
ROLE: sup, adc, jg

I'm up for it if you'll have me :)
